raw: Coachella, Stagecoach officially postponed over coronavirus concerns .
replaced: Stagecoach officially postponed over coronavirus concerns .

raw: " At the direction of the County of Riverside and local health authorities , we must sadly confirm the rescheduling of Coachella and Stagecoach due to COVID-19 concerns , " said a statement from Goldenvoice , the production company behind both festivals .

raw: The Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival will now take place October 9 - 11 and October 16 - 18 , 2020 .

It had been scheduled to take place April 24 - 26 in Indio .

raw: Both events , which attract hundreds of thousands of visitors , join a host of others -- from concert tour legs to conferences -- that have canceled or rescheduled plans as the number of global cases of coronavirus continues to climb .
